attributes.action: create a nationwide wifi network for wireless internet anywhere enabling all to recieve internet access
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: create wireless internet (wifi/wimax) nationwide to enable an easier access to internet in the same way the mobile phone works, making a nationwide "hotspot." encorporationg new technologies such as 802.11g/n for fast broadband connections.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
